TopicTitle: Cause/Workaround for missing maneuver node trajectory

Articles.Content: Looks like it is because sometimes your current stage shows 0 delta-v remaining, even though there is fuel in the tank. When you plot your node, nothing moves when you drag your burn vectors. However if you derp around with adding/deleting stages you can get your delta-v to display properly, and your maneuver will display again. Hard to describe but it shows in this video. You can see the frustration but at about the 8 minute mark what you can try to resolve his issue. I'm sure this will be an easy fix for the devs. Loving the game! Cheers!

Gold, gonna try

Indeed solves the vanishing maneuver notes !

Thanks a lot! Back to somehow playable
Thank you very much, your delta v fix is what I was looking for!
